XGTagger Copyright Ecole Nationale Superieure des Mines de Saint-Etienne Original authors: Aude Garnier and Xavier Tannier. Modifications by Philip R. "Pib" Burns at Northwestern University for integration into MorphAdorner. Please DO NOT address questions about this modified version to the original authors. This software is a computer program whose purpose is to provide a generic interface to deal with and analyse any XML textual content.
